message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) category as it deals with motion representation for video action recognition. It also involves the use of deep learning techniques, which makes it relevant to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) category. The paper also involves the use of optical flow, which is a common technique in Multimedia (cs.MM) research. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approach to motion representation, which involves the use of spatiotemporal gradients, making it relevant to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) category. Finally, the paper involves the use of a neural network, which makes it relevant to the Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) category.
